scenario_text.value:
Was I seeing things? No...that can’t be it.
Then we’re actually...
Ryo...? What’s up?
Shut up... Get lost, would you?
Hey, that was an actual response!
Kewkew!
Are you feeling better now?

Whaddya mean, better? You act like...like
there’s something wrong with me!

Uh... well, look, in a way, I feel like
there’s something wrong with me, too.
I think you could say that about all of us.
Hey, if you got nothin’ to say, get lost.

(I thought he’d lost it earlier, but now he’s
talking with me just fine.)
(What kind of state is he in right now?)
(Maybe if I ask the right questions, I can find out.)
What’s going on?
What’s our next move?
How do you feel?
How’s our situation?
What’s going on?

So, what do you think’s actually going on
right now?

...Shut up. Whatever’s happening, it doesn’t
matter.

(Well, he may be talking, but I see he’s as
prickly as ever.)
What’s our next move?
Okay, what do you think we should do next?

I’m telling you, who cares? Whatever we do,
we’re just gonna die...

Well, I can only speak for myself, but I’m
not planning on dying here.

Sure, we’ll all die some day, but that’s way
in the future, when we’re old men and women.

That’s not what I’m talking about! Argh, you
idiot!
How do you feel?

Shut up! It doesn’t matter what you say...
Urrrgh... Argh!

(I can certainly understand how Ryo feels
right now.)

(He must be worried sick, and we’re all just
kids. There’s nobody for him to rely on.)

(Shuuji’s the only one here older than Ryo,
and he doesn’t exactly inspire confidence.)
How’s our situation?

Look, you’re just a stupid brat, so you
probably don’t get it, but...

Our situation... Our situation is... Damn it!
Argh, we’re so screwed!

*mumble* *mumble* Yeah, that’s it... This has
to be... *mumble* The afterlife...

(He’s not looking at me anymore. Guess he’s
back in his own world... Ugh.)
(Was there anything else I wanted to ask?)
That’s all.
There’s more.

(Well, at least I got to talk with him...
He’ll be okay...right?)
Is Ryo really all right? I’m worried.
Kewww...kew...

I know how you feel, but...I’m not sure what
to do either.

That’s it. It must be. I wasn’t seeing
things. They had to be ghosts...

Yes, and that must mean we’re ghosts too...
*mumble* *mumble* Ungh...gahhh!

(What should we do with Ryo...? I can’t just
leave him like this...)

Heh, heheheh... And if that’s true, I can see
her... I can see Mommy...
